reviews.review_text: Robert was so helpful and informative during our recent session about my pension and retirement plans. He was extremely knowledgeable and insightful, and he took the time to answer all of my questions, present me with different options, and he showed me numbers based on those options. He was also very nice and easy to talk to - I felt like he understood all of my concerns, and he really had my best interests in mind. I highly recommend speaking with Robert if you have any questions or concerns about your pension options.

Cal from Rise North Capital has been incredibly helpful for me over the last year or so. When he and I first met I had 2 different 401k’s or 403b’s with 3 different jobs and I was just starting out at a new job about to open a 4th account with my new company. I had no idea how to roll any of them over into each other, but Cal not only helped explain the process to me, he called each company with me on the line to walk through the process together to make it as painless as possible. Now all of my money sits in 1 account to collect as much interest as possible, and he and I have moved on to other financial goals together. I can honestly say I never would have done that without his help. I’m so grateful to Rise North Capital to their services, and Cal specifically for how knowledgeable, responsive, and kind he has been every step of the way. Highly recommend this company!

The pension advisor I worked with was incredibly kind, patient, and knowledgeable. He took the time to explain everything in a way that was easy to understand, making the process smooth and stress-free. I truly appreciate their professionalism and dedication to helping educators make informed pension decisions. Highly recommend!

I cannot thank Derek enough for his exceptional guidance and patience in helping me understand my pension benefits and retirement timeline. Both he and Rhys made me feel comfortable and treated me with genuine respect, speaking to me on a personal level. The entire process was transparent, and all my questions were answered thoroughly. I wholeheartedly recommend Derek and Public School Pension Help to my close friends and family. Remember to do your own research and feel free to ask questions—Derek ensures that any requested documents are provided promptly. Thank you, Derek, and the team at PSPH!
Brandon was very helpful and courteous. I appreciate the time he took making sure how he could be helpful with my pension questions.

Brendan was an absolute pleasure to work with. He was very professional, friendly, and easy to talk to. Brendan was thoughtful in approaching our pension analysis and customized everything to our situation. Highly recommend!

I worked with the Public School Pension Help team to help a family member, and could not wish for a better service and advice. With their guidance I was able to navigate a complicated pension situation, and thankfully we now have a clear understanding of all the benefits available. Now my loved one has peace of mind and their retirement is on track. Thank you, Matt and team, I am lucky to have you in my corner.
reviews.school_district: New York City Department of Education

reviews.review_text: Being guided by Kira has been an incredibly positive experience. She is highly organized, knowledgeable, and easy to follow. I never realized how much a pension advisor could ease my anxiety about retirement until I started working with Kira. She provided me with a clear picture of my pension benefits and helped me understand my retirement timeline. Kira's organization is impressive—after every meeting, she provided a clear summary of our discussion via email, along with my action items. I highly recommend her as your pension advisor!
Dominic was unbelievably helpful with my pension questions.
These people make you feel like you're more of a friend than a client. They make it easy to trust them with your pension planning.
RJ super knowable and professional. Thank you for your pension advise and support!

I have had the pleasure of working with Jacob for a couple of years now. He has not only taken my confusion about pensions away, he has given me someone I can trust to help me make these decisions. I would highly recommend him to help you understand your pension benefits.
Brendan is great to work with. You can really tell he cares about putting his clients in the best position possible for retirement!
MJ has been a gem—There's lots I'd like to learn about my pension so I'm prepared for retirement.
My meeting with Yen and Gabriel was very pleasant, informative and helpful towards understanding my pension benefits and retirement goals. I would 100% recommend! :)

Very happy to have finally understood my pension benefits with the help of Robert at PSPH! It was really stressing me out but one of those things I had to get done. Rob was VERY patient with me and communicated great whether it was by phone, zoom, text or email he took care of me and answered all my questions! Thank you so so so much Rob!
RJ is responsive and cares about the pension needs of his clients. He makes himself available and always follows up with detailed notes and explains any questions that I have. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
R.J. has been AMAZING and nothing but helpful and very informative about our pension and retirement future.
So thankful for Christian getting me on the path to retirement and keeping me there.

Working with Samuel and Marlen has been such an easy and beneficial experience. The organization and thoughtfulness from the both of them made this process smooth and simple. Their professionalism and altruistic personalities really allowed my husband and I to make the proper decisions for our family's pension planning. 10/10 recommend going through Sam and Marlen for any of your pension needs.

Sam even took time out of his day to help me set up my Microsoft OneNote app and organize it like his. Sam and Marlen's eagerness and willingness to go above and beyond was something that set the bar pretty high for my family.
Very efficient and catered to my pension and retirement goals!

I have been working with Public School Pension Help for over 2 years, and from the initial consultation to developing a comprehensive pension and retirement plan, their team has demonstrated exceptional expertise and dedication. They provided clear and consistent communication throughout the process and ensured that all aspects of my pension planning were handled with the utmost professionalism.
I have been very pleased with my experience with Public School Pension Help. RJ is always available to answer any pension questions and address any concerns I may have.

We worked with Cal who we really like. He is knowledgeable, informative, and anticipated some of our pension needs. It feels good to have a retirement plan we can trust going forward. Thanks, Cal! Matt and Deb
Excellent personal attention and attention to detail on my pension analysis.
